title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Beat the eggs and mix with the cheeses.
Drain the pasta and combine with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in tikka masala paste.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Fry the onion and spices in butter.
Add tomato puree and cream, and simmer.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
